Plain Meaning Bible (Debug)

This internal workspace will grow into the Plain Meaning Bible experience. It currently surfaces a complete OSIS milestone demonstration so the UI can mature alongside the data pipeline.

Current Status

The milestone renderer is a minimal proof-of-concept. Upcoming iterations will replace the hard-coded styling with reusable components and integrate a streaming parser for production-sized texts.

Next Focus Areas

  • Validate OSIS ingestion using a representative dataset (e.g., OSIS KJV) and create a rendering adapter for our web components.
  • Design a chunking model so we can stream chapter/verse content efficiently without blocking the UI.
  • Prototype search indexing that can tag verses, headings, and footnotes for fast lookup.
Coming soon: OSIS preview panel

Embed a live renderer that can display books, chapters, and intra-verse markup for developer validation.

Coming soon: Search playground

Stand up a simple keyword search to validate tokenization and scoring before scaling out.
